channel.title: Blogs on Seattle African Violet Society ( SAVS )
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Seattle African Violet Society ( SAVS )

item.title: Growing Violets
item.description: ANYONE can grow beautiful African violets ANYWHERE if they will provide the simple conditions required for healthy growth.

item.title: Membership FAQ
item.description: Join Today! Why should I come to a meeting? Meetings are fun, educational, and a good opportunity to learn and share knowledge of successfully growing African violets and other Gesneriads.
